#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	char arr[100005];
	cin>>arr;
	int m=strlen(arr);
	int tc;
	cin>>tc;
	while(tc--)
	{
		long long int x,y;
		cin>>x>>y;
		int w1,w2;
		w1=x%m;
		w2=y%m;
		if(arr[w1-1]==arr[w2-1])
		{
			cout<<"Yes"<<endl;
		}
		else 
		cout<<"No"<<endl;
	}
 return 0;
}
